description: This is a Dart source file defining a Flutter widget for a dashboard screen in a fleet management system. It displays key performance indicators (KPIs) such as total vehicles, active vehicles, and vehicles under maintenance, with animation effects and data loaded via a provider.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: StatefulWidget representing the dashboard screen UI.

classes.name: _DashboardScreenState
classes.description: State class managing animation, data loading, and UI building for DashboardScreen.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes animation controller and triggers data load after first frame.

methods.name: _kpiCard
methods.description: Builds a Card widget displaying a KPI label and value.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the dashboard UI, including animated fade-in and KPIs.
